page.title: 11THE GOWER IS A RURAL AREA
page.content: Our area of Gower a is very rural agricultural area where there are quite a few farms, I live on a farm in {Pennard }which is about two and a quarter miles along the road. The road is a main road which caters for all traffic, cars, bikes, lorries, vans. If you follow the road you get to {Swansea}which has many shops which sell a wide range of goods such as { {food, drink, fashion clothes, shoes, {video recorders, stereos, televisions} and many other items. In our area of { {Pennard} there are a few clubs to go to in the evenings for all ages. I go to the {Young Farmers Club}where I have lots of friends who also come from farms. In the club we have{films, {talks}and a {rally}every year where there are many {competitions}some serious, some we do for fun. JANET WATKINS 5H
